title: A very special Easter Sunday this year...
content:
... as it coincides with [Jared](http://web.archive.org/web/20070628215914/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Jared%2520Benson)’s [birthday](http://web.archive.org/web/20070628215914/http:/www.icalx.com/html/typophile/day.php?cal=Typophile). Have a good one, Jared, and thank you for providing a safe haven for all of us typophile refugees. And don’t eat too many chocolate easter eggs today... ;^)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070628215914im_/http:/typophile.com/files/JaredBenson_Bday2006.jpg)

 [‹ How are you doing that?](http://web.archive.org/web/20070628215914/http:/typophile.com/node/19296 "Go to previous forum topic") [Google doesn't lie… ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070628215914/http:/typophile.com/node/19279 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Bald Condensed

comments.content: Thanks for Typophile and all the best!

Happiest Birthday, Jared.

_( Ooh, And ’Happy Easter’, or so, to those that celebrate it. :)_

Dav

Happy Birthday to the Typophile Easter Bunny!  
who keeps type hopping for us all :-)

ChrisL
Happy day to our dear founder. Congratulations on all your recent success. Here’s to another year of big things for Benson.

here’s a little birthday ditty we used to sing to the birthday kids in class at [BYU](http://web.archive.org/web/20070628215914/http:/typophile.com/wiki/BYU):

Пусть бегут неуклюже  
Пешеходы по лужам,  
А вода — по асфальту рекой.  
И неясно прохожим  
В этот день непогожий,  
Почему я веселый такой.

Я играю на гармошке  
У прохожих на виду…  
К сожаленью, день рожденья  
Только раз в году.

Прилетит вдруг волшебник  
В голубом вертолете  
И бесплатно покажет кино.  
С днем рожденья поздравит  
И, наверно, оставит  
Мне в подарок пятьсот «эскимо».

Я играю на гармошке  
У прохожих на виду…  
К сожаленью, день рожденья  
Только раз в году.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070628215914im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cd093.gif)
Happiest of Birthdays and Happy Easter, Jared. May the coming year be as over-flowing with blessings as the last.
